help.title: Blackburn Buccaneer S2 - Observer
help.line: Approach speed (full flaps/aileron droop/tail flaps/airbrake): 145 kts IAS
To use the Observer View set /sim/remote/pilot-callsign to the Buccaneer
multiplayer callsign you wish to link with (default G-VMM)
The other mulitplayer must similarly set your multiplayer callsign
If this is cooerct you will see "Welcome onboard" in your view
Now press Ctrl V then q/Q until you see the Buccaneer Observer view
